body:
I am getting a configure error in `spack install libedit` with the following entry in the log:
```
checking for tgetent in -lncurses... no
checking for tgetent in -lcurses... no
checking for tgetent in -ltermcap... no
configure: error: libncurses, libcurses, or libtermcap is required!
```
This may be a result of the recent change to provide libncursesw, also discussed in #3727.
title: Error configuring libedit
